title: Wire Cutter
summaries: The Wire Cutter is a tool that allows players to free and harvest Wires and Actuators. It is sold by the Mechanic NPC who is initially found in the Dungeon.

The Wire Cutter has a large range bonus, making it able to reach a large portion of the screen. [img:Desktop version]It is recommended that you obtain this item if you frequently wire different devices, as it is also a material in the Multicolor Wrench.

statistics.Buy: 2
statistics.Sell: 40

result.value: [img:Multicolor Wrench]Multicolor Wrench
